mediaControls.title: Basic Media Controls
mediaControls.spacebar: Press {space} to play/pause the video or audio
mediaControls.spectrogramClick: Click or drag on the {spectrogram} to seek to a specific position
mediaControls.arrowKeys: Use {leftKey} or {rightKey} to seek 5 seconds back or forward
mediaControls.mouseWheel: Use mouse wheel to zoom into the {timeline}, or use the range slider below
mediaControls.ctrlClick: Use {ctrlKey} + left click to move around the {timeline}

segments.title: Transcription Segments
segments.intro: At the bottom, the current {transcriptionSegment} is shown for editing:
segments.speaker: In the {dropdown}, assign a speaker (type in the search box to create a new speaker)
segments.timeChange: Change the time in seconds in the {timespanTextFields}
segments.seekTime: Click on the timestamps to seek to that time
segments.insertBefore: Press the button with the arrow up {insertAbove} to insert a segment before
segments.insertAfter: Press the button with the arrow down {insertBelow} to insert a segment below
segments.deleteSegment: Press the delete button {delete} to remove the segment

timeline.title: Working with Segments on Timeline
timeline.hoverText: Hover over a rectangle to see the text
timeline.clickSelect: Click on a rectangle to select it and see the handles
timeline.moveWithKeys: When selected, you can move the rectangle 0.5 seconds to the left or right with the arrow keys
timeline.dragMove: Drag the rectangle to move it
timeline.resizeHandles: Drag the handles on the left or right side to resize the rectangle
timeline.altSnap: Hold the {altKey} key while moving to prevent snapping to other rectangles

editing.title: Editing Operations
editing.buttons: Or press the undo/redo buttons at the top left
